ai-patthana23.31:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles means to the extent of the Dhamma.
ai-patthana23.31:0.3_0: I am skilled in means, and doing what is good.
ai-patthana23.31:1.1_0: or a limited object of principles,
ai-patthana23.31:1.1_1: This is the reason why the same thing ...
ai-patthana23.31:2.1_0: or a limited object of the teaching does not give rise to a limited object,
ai-patthana23.31:2.1_2: all the more than fourteen bases.
ai-patthana23.31:3.1_0: Not with a limited object, nor being unshakable object,
ai-patthana23.31:3.1_1: This is the section in brief ...
ai-patthana23.31:3.1_2: In the same way there is no one-factor in the next lifetime of the limited objects, in the debtermination of the sea, no two and eighth days came.
